title: [Large-scale] EMI Teaching Methodology Workshop Focused on Scientific Themes

context.prior_knowledge: Basic Scientific Terminology and Management Experience
context.additional_context: Training program for cultivating science education leaders within enterprises, utilizing smartphone-based collaboration tools in PC-unavailable environments

learning_goals: Learners can execute three strategies to explain science concepts in English using a theme-based teaching approach
Learners can achieve over 80% comprehension by applying translanguaging strategies in project-based activities
Learners can propose two or more language mixing techniques reflecting cultural context when designing EMI (English as a Medium of Instruction) classes in small group settings

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
